text:
Bol.com | Software Engineer | The Netherlands | Onsite | Visa sponsored

Bol.com is the most successful online retailer in The Netherlands and Belgium, with over 7 million customers, 30 million monthly visits and 15 million products.

We're looking for strong (backend) engineers. Main language is Java, though you'll also find Golang, Koting, Scala where it makes sense.

More info: jbernhart@bol.com
